Smart Coffee Maker: Develop a coffee maker that uses AI to learn your preferred brewing parameters and automatically adjusts the settings to create the perfect cup of coffee. The machine could have a built-in coffee bean grinder, water heater, and brewing chamber, and use sensors to measure the water temperature, coffee-to-water ratio, and coffee grounds consistency.

Automatic Coffee Bean Hopper: Create a coffee maker that can automatically dispense the right amount of coffee beans for each brewing cycle. The machine could have a built-in bean hopper that can measure and dispense the exact amount of beans needed for each cup, ensuring consistent flavor and quality.

Coffee Maker with Built-In Coffee Roaster: Develop a coffee maker that includes a built-in coffee roaster, allowing users to roast their own coffee beans and brew their coffee in one step. The machine could have a spinning drum that roasts the beans to the perfect level of darkness and evenly distributes the heat for consistent roasting.

Smart Coffee Maker with Health Monitoring: Create a coffee maker that can monitor the user's health and adjust the brewing parameters accordingly. The machine could use sensors to measure the user's heart rate, blood pressure, and other vital signs and adjust the brewing temperature, water flow, and coffee-to-water ratio to create a customized cup of coffee that is tailored to their health needs.

Coffee Maker with Integrated Water Filtration System: Develop a coffee maker that includes an integrated water filtration system, ensuring that the water used for brewing is always clean and free of impurities. The machine could have a built-in water filter that can remove chlorine, lead, and other contaminants from the water, resulting in a more flavorful and aromatic cup of coffee.
